metadata.name: Opependant
metadata.description:
A luxurious jewelry version, created by Idanco, for the original Opepen collection by Jack Butcher 

Comprising 50 distinct pendants, each decorated with a unique combination of carefully selected gems, this piece not only showcases beauty but also imparts valuable information. Through the detailed gems combinations, it offers a deeper understanding on common gems found in luxury jewelry, providing an engaging educational experience. 

This piece embodies core values from the original opepen collection, including creativity, uniqueness, and evolution, and marks a significant milestone as my very first open edition.

As with all my works, each piece can be transformed into a physical treasure upon request.

Enjoy!
